Basic Table, default style (AlternatingRowGrid):
╔════╤════╤════╤════╗
[49m║[49m A1 [39m[49m[49m│ A2 [39m[49m[49m│ A3 [39m[49m[49m│ A4 [39m[49m[49m║
[49m║[100m B1 [39m[49m[100m│ B2 [39m[49m[100m│ B3 [39m[49m[100m│ B4 [39m[49m[49m║

Table with header, AlteratingRowGrid:
╔══════╤══════╤══════╤══════╗
[49m║[49m [1mCol1[39m[49m [49m│ [1mCol2[39m[49m [49m│ [1mCol3[39m[49m [49m│ [1mCol4[39m[49m [49m║
